description: Proxmox Dashboard from Prometheus data source for data ingested from Proxmox Metrics Server -> InfluxDB (i.e. VictoriaMetrics).

targets.expr: max by(host, vmid, object, nodename) (system_uptime{nodename=~"$node", object!="nodes", host=~"$vm"}) > 0

panels.description: Uses external metrics from lm-sensors -> collectd -> Graphite.
panels.title: Temperature

panels.description: Uses external metrics from lm-sensors -> collectd -> Graphite.
panels.title: Fan

list.description: Metrics rate for cumulative values such as Net and Disk I/O to calculate the correct rate. Proxmox seems to default to 1m.
list.label: Rate
list.name: rate

title: Proxmox
